title: Ep 106 | Phil Robertson vs. the Damming Evidence and a Culture That Forgot Jesus
description:
Phil may not be a ninja, but he knows what it takes to win a fight against the local beavers: It's time for Operation Mother of All Commode Flushes. Phil's dangerous plan from episode 101 gets a reboot, and Phil tells Jase and Al why their advice on beaver dam removal leaves something to be desired. Jase brings up a question about who gets saved and explains why Jesus is so loved and so hated. And Phil looks at our culture and doesn't find a whole lot of Jesus, especially in the schools. 

https://KEEPS.com/DOOR 

https://Bambee.com/ROBERTSON 

https://Adjace.com
